thread.title: Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm

title: Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm
text:
Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm 12:04pm GMT - 01:19 
Australian winemakers are cultivating connections in China, the world’s fastest-growing wine market, that are bearing valuable fruit even as entrenched European exporters are hitting headwinds. Rosanna Philpott reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Australian winemakers are cultivating connections in China, the world’s fastest-growing wine market, that are bearing valuable fruit even as entrenched European exporters are hitting headwinds. Rosanna Philpott reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EEzUPF
